jenes.tutorials.problem13

Class Student

  • java.lang.Object
    • jenes.tutorials.problem13.Student
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Student.Nobody

    public abstract class Student
extends java.lang.Object
    Rappresent an abstraction of a student who is bound. A student has an agenda that must be mapped by overriding the method isBusy()
    Since:
    2.1

      • getName

      • setName

      • isBusy

        public abstract boolean isBusy(Day day,
             int hour)
        This method maps the student's agenda, it tells us if the student is busy or not
        Parameters:
        day - the day of the week in which we check if the student is busy
        hour - the hour of the day in which we check if the student is busy. This parameter must be in the interval 0-24
        Returns:
        true if the student is busy in that day at the specified hour, else return false

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        This class represents the student who never is busy or the concept that nobody does something
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
